K-12 ARCHITECTURE KIT DOCUMENTATION
K-12 Object Reference

Learn about the objects in K-12 Architecture Kit and what they represent in your school.

Academic Certification
Academic Certification represents an academic degree, diploma, or certificate.
Account
An Account represents either an organizational entity affiliated with a Contact or a container Account for a Contact.
Address
Address represents a home, seasonal, or other address for a Contact or Account.
Affiliation
Affiliation represents an affiliation between a Contact and an Account.
Application
Application stores information about a student's application to an educational institution or program.
Attendance Event
Attendance Event represents information about a student's attendance.
Attributes
Attribute represents characteristics that apply to individual students and credentials earned by students and faculty (or other Contacts).
Behavior Involvement
Behavior Involvement lets you associate individuals with a behavior event that's tracked as a Case.
Behavior Response
Behavior Response helps you track corrective actions and other responses to behavior events.
Case
Case represents a behavior event and can have related Behavior Involvement records.
Contact
A Contact represents an individual person.
Contact Language
Contact Language represents a language spoken by someone connected to your institution.
Course
Course represents an academic course, typically offered periodically by an Account entity, such as a department or school.
Course Connection
Course Connection represents a relationship between a Contact, such as a student or faculty member, and a Course Offering.
Course Offering
Course Offering represents a specific instance of a Course that's offered during a specific Term.
Course Offering Schedule
Course Offering Schedule relates a Course Offering with a Time Block, allowing for class schedule variations in the locations and days of a specific offering.
Credential
Track student achievement, such as badges, certifications, or licenses.
Education History
Education History stores information about a Contact's education history and related data.
Facility
Facility represents a school property asset.
Grade Enrollment
Grade Enrollment represents student's enrollment in a grade at an educational institution.
Language
Language represents a language spoken at your institution.
Lead
Lead represents a potential student to an educational institution or program.
Plan Requirement
Plan Requirement represents a required item to fulfill the requirements of an Academic Program, as specified in a Program Plan.
Program Enrollment
Program Enrollment represents a student's (Contact's) enrollment in an Academic Program (Account).
Program Plan
Program Plan represents the course of study required to fulfill the requirements of an Academic Program (Account).
Relationship
Relationship represents a connection between two Contacts.
Term
Term represents an academic period when your institution is in session.
Term Grade
Term Grade stores student grades for a specific grading period.
Test
An instance of a student taking a test.
Test Score
The score on a section of a specific test or a composite score.
Time Block
Time Block represents a specific period of time, often as it relates to Course Offerings.
